title: Papers of the Peabody Museum of Archaeology and Ethnology, Harvard University
aka: Papers of the Peabody Museum of American Archaeology and Ethnology, Harvard University

renewed-issues.note: 'Early Man and Pleistocene Stratigraphy in Southern and Easternm Asia' by Hallam L. Movius, Jr.

additional-note: The issue renewals mentioned here are ones for which the Papers of the Peabody Museum was specifically mentioned in the renewal record in CCE or the registered works database. These issues, like others in this series, have distinctive titles. Before concluding an issue (other than these) is in the public domain, search for book renewals for the issue under its distinctive title. We have not systematically searched individual issue titles.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Felice Gollotti for copyright research on this title.
